name: growth
effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.  During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Forces the body to grow
and heightens SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Forces the body to grow
and heightens SP. ATK.

forced to grow,
raising the SP.
ATK stat.
